heisig_chinese_memo: You need some serious tongue muscle to manage eating chili peppers.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Drops of sweat pour off the muscle man's body as he tries to manage one more rep.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " force " and " collateral ", the original meaning is governance and management. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Dedicated to your efforts. Conscientiously, the sound of you." "Historical Records-Xiang Yu Benji": "Every Wuzhong has great service and funeral, Xiang Liangchang is the organizer, and the Yin Yi Department of Warfare provides guests and children , So we know what it can do."

" Do " can mean holding. "Guan Zi‧ Zhong Kuang": "The public said: "If you are a civilian-run military, is it okay?" He said: "No, the soldiers are not enough.""

" Operate " can also mean purchase and financing. Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Chong Hou Yin": "Chinese cooks serve rich meals, cook sheep and fatten cattle."

" Do " can also mean having. Song Su Shi, "Li Shi Yuan": "When life is in camp, why is the man born? What should I do? You will always compete with Qingjing."

" Do " also means preparation. Song Guanjian "Yu Lianhuan·Boyingzhou Zhongshipu": "I have already done a trip and returned, and the south of the Yangtze River is misty and rainy."

" Do " also means punishment in modern Chinese. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 93: "Jia Zhengzheng is waiting for Lai Da to come back to run Jia Qin. At this time, he wants the class again, and I feel puzzled."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " force " and " collateral ", the original meaning is governance and management.
humanum_full_description:
從「力」，「辡」聲，本義為治理、辦理。《說文新附》：「致力也。从力，辡聲。」《史記‧項羽本紀》：「每吳中有大繇役及喪，項梁常為主辦，陰以兵法部勒賓客及子弟，以是知其能。」

　　「辦」可表示舉辦。《管子‧中匡》：「公曰：『民辦軍事矣，則可乎？』對曰：『不可，甲兵未足也。』」

　　「辦」還可表示置辦、籌措。三國魏曹植〈箜篌引〉：「中廚辦豐膳，烹羊宰肥牛。」

　　「辦」也可表示具有。宋蘇軾〈李氏園〉：「人生營居止，竟為何人卜。何當辦一身，永與清景逐。」

　　「辦」亦表示準備。宋管鑒〈玉連環‧泊英州鍾石鋪〉：「已辦一簑歸去，江南煙雨。」

　　「辦」在近現代漢語中也表示處罰。《紅樓夢》第93回：「賈政正等賴大回來要辦賈芹，此時又要該班，心裏納悶。」
humanum_short_description: 從「力」，「辡」聲，本義為治理、辦理。

English Definition: to do; to manage; to handle; to go about; to run; to set up; to deal with
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 辛
Pictophonetic: 辛 indicates the sound; 力 (strength) conveys the meaning.

    • 辛 [ xīn ] bitter; toilsome, laborious; 8th heavenly stem
    • 力 [ lì ] strength, power; capability, influence

從「 力 」，「 辡 」聲，本義為治理、辦理。《說文新附》：「致力也。从力，辡聲。」《史記‧項羽本紀》：「每吳中有大繇役及喪，項梁常為主辦，陰以兵法部勒賓客及子弟，以是知其能。」 「 辦 」可表示舉辦。《管子‧中匡》：「公曰：『民辦軍事矣，則可乎？』對曰：『不可，甲兵未足也。』」 「 辦 」還可表示置辦、籌措。三國魏曹植〈箜篌引〉：「中廚辦豐膳，烹羊宰肥牛。」 「 辦 」也可表示具有。宋蘇軾〈李氏園〉：「人生營居止，竟為何人卜。何當辦一身，永與清景逐。」 「 辦 」亦表示準備。宋管鑒〈玉連環‧泊英州鍾石鋪〉：「已辦一簑歸去，江南煙雨。」 「 辦 」在近現代漢語中也表示處罰。《紅樓夢》第93回：「賈政正等賴大回來要辦賈芹，此時又要該班，心裏納悶。」
From the sound of " force" and " collateral", the original meaning is governance and management. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Dedicated to your efforts. Conscientiously, the sound of you." "Historical Records-Xiang Yu Benji": "Every Wuzhong has great service and funeral, Xiang Liangchang is the organizer, and the Yin Yi Department of Warfare provides guests and children , So we know what it can do." " Do" can mean holding. "Guan Zi‧ Zhong Kuang": "The public said: "If you are a civilian-run military, is it okay?" He said: "No, the soldiers are not enough."" " Operate" can also mean purchase and financing. Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Chong Hou Yin": "Chinese cooks serve rich meals, cook sheep and fatten cattle." " Do" can also mean having. Song Su Shi, "Li Shi Yuan": "When life is in camp, why is the man born? What should I do? You will always compete with Qingjing." " Do" also means preparation. Song Guanjian "Yu Lianhuan·Boyingzhou Zhongshipu": "I have already done a trip and returned, and the south of the Yangtze River is misty and rainy." " Do" also means punishment in modern Chinese. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 93: "Jia Zhengzheng is waiting for Lai Da to come back to run Jia Qin. At this time, he wants the class again, and I feel puzzled."

辦字的基本解释

辦
bàn
见“办”。

辦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bàn］
［《廣韻》蒲莧切，去襇，並。］
“办1”的繁体字。“辨2”的今字。
(1)成，成功。
(2)办理，治理。
(3)惩治，处罚。
(4)置办，筹措。
(5)兴办，举办。
(6)具有；抱有。
(7)打算，准备。
(8)有才能，有才干。

辦字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辛字部】　辦； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1251第18
【集韻】【韻會】皮莧切【正韻】備莧切，?音辨。【說文】致力也。【集韻】具也。【史記·項羽紀】項梁常爲主辦。【前漢·韓信傳】多多益辦。　又與辨通。【周禮·冬官考工記】以辨民器。【註】辨，猶具也。

辦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
辦字的起名意思

暂无。

(1) Success, success.
(2) Handling and governance.
(3) Punishment and punishment.
(4) Purchase and financing.
(5) To set up and hold.
(6) Have; hold.
(7) Plan and prepare.
(8) Talented and talented.
